rows.label: tlk45370122_01_msg0001
rows.name:
As time goes on, many soldiers have
begun to harbor all kinds of doubts
that distract from their duties.

rows.label: tlk45370122_01_msg0002
rows.name:
But Newt's passion for her duty
was unwavering. She reminded me
of the Superbian army's golden days.

rows.label: tlk45370122_01_msg0003
rows.name:
Newt was a valuable asset
to Superbia.

rows.label: tlk45370122_01_msg0004
rows.name:
Once her time with you is done and she
returns to her Core Crystal, I hope you
will return her to the Superbian army.
